content.text:
# San Francisco Film Critics Circle Awards 2010

9th SFFCC Awards
December 13, 2010
----
Best Picture:
The Social Network
The 9th San Francisco Film Critics Circle Awards, honoring the best in film for 2010, were given on 13 December 2010.
Winners
, Best Director co-winner]]
, Best Director co-winner]]
, Best Actor winner]]
, Best Actress winner]]
, Best Supporting Actor winner]]
, Best Supporting Actress winner]]
*Best Picture:
**The Social Network
*Best Director (TIE):
**Darren Aronofsky – Black Swan
**David Fincher – The Social Network
*Best Original Screenplay:
**''The King's Speech – David Seidler
*Best Adapted Screenplay:
**The Social Network – Aaron Sorkin
*Best Actor:
**Colin Firth – The King's Speech
*Best Actress:
**Michelle Williams – Blue Valentine
*Best Supporting Actor:
**John Hawkes – Winter's Bone
*Best Supporting Actress:
**Jacki Weaver – Animal Kingdom
*Best Animated Feature:
**Toy Story 3
*Best Foreign Language Film:
**Mother (Madeo) • South Korea
*Best Documentary:
**The Tillman Story
*Best Cinematography:
**Black Swan'' – Matthew Libatique
*Marlon Riggs Award (for courage & vision in the Bay Area film community):
**Elliot Lavine (in recognition of his two decades of film programming, his revival of rare archival and independent titles, and his role in the renewed popularity of film noir and pre-Production Code features)
References
* [http://www.awardsdaily.com/2010/12/the-san-francisco-film-critics-pick-the-social-network S.F. Film Critics Circle honors 'Social Network']
